source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Autodesk Maya the Basics for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies
visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre
visible_instructors.name: UK Online

items.headline: Autodesk Maya the Basics for Beginners grounding you in the skills you need to move forwards in your 3D Maya skills
objectives_summary: Understand and have a working knowledge of Maya
Be able to start more involved courses

items.title: Learn Substance Designer for Texturing Game Assets

visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Create a Procedural Brick Wall from Start-to-Finish and Learn to Create Materials with Substance Designer!
objectives_summary: Texture creation in Substance Designer
Understand PBR texture creation workflow
How to create a proper heightmap, normal map, roughness map, and metallness map

items.title: Create your own Hulk Vol.1: Body Modeling
items.headline: Learn how to create your own character regardless of it's characteristics
objectives_summary: You will be get know all of the stages necessary to model a 3D character, it doesn't matter the complexity of the character, you'll learn all the stages to scuplt and how to improve your character step by step.
You'll also get to know a series of tools and techniques to sculpt, but more important you'll learn why and when to use them.

items.title: Zbrush 2021 Character Likeness Sculpting Tutorial
items.headline: Anthony Hopkins likeness course: The only likeness course you will ever need to make any character more life like.
objectives_summary: How to Sculpt Photo Realistic Character Likeness
How to Match Your Model with the Reference.
How to Make Realistic Skin Detailing in Zbrush.

items.title: The Complete Digital Game Artist Trainer
items.headline: Learn How to Create Triple-A Artwork for Video Games and Simulations
objectives_summary: 3D modeling of game props and assets
Texturing, including albedo, specular, reflection, AO, and normal maps
Physically Based Rendering (PBR) with smart materials

items.title: Blender Academy
items.headline: 3D Modeling and Animation
objectives_summary: User Interface, Navigation and more
Modeling Fundamentals
Shading Fundamentals

items.title: After Effects Learn Logo Reveal or Logo Pop-Up Animation

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor 94,000+ Students in 180 Countries
visible_instructors.title: Harsh Vardhan Art
visible_instructors.name: Harsh Vardhan

items.headline: Start Creating Your own Logo Animation or Logo Reveal Animation Professionally
objectives_summary: Basic Knowledge of Adobe After Effects
Create Your own Logo Pop-Up or Kinetic Animation in Adobe After Effects
How to Render Animation in Adobe After Effects & Adobe Media Encoder

items.title: Krita QuickStart: for Digital Painting and Animation
items.headline: Learn to paint digitally and animate using the free open source software.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to draw and paint digitally as well as animate in the free open source software.

items.title: 3D Modeling Bootcamp in Blender - The 3D creator course
items.headline: Learn 3D modeling in Blender - 3D Graphics -  A step-by-step guide to modeling, material & rendering in Blender 3D - B3D
objectives_summary: Learn how to create this 3D model in Blender and start creating 3D assets for games and 3D printing
Understand Blenders 3D modelling tools and start creating 3D models fast and efficiently
The core skills needed to create photo realistic 3D models in Blender 3D

items.title: Cinema 4D - Daily Render Scifi Scene with Octane Render
items.headline: Level up your Cinema 4D and Octane skills and start making Daily Renders Fast!
objectives_summary: Create your own Daily Render in Cinema 4D and Octane

items.title: Become An FX Artist Using Houdini
items.headline: Learn How To Create High-End Visual Effects Using Houdini
objectives_summary: Everything from Particles and Grains, Wires, RBD’s, Pyro and smoke, vellum, and Flip will be covered.
More Advanced Houdini techniques
Creating stunning VFX Shots

items.title: Mastering XPresso with CINEMA 4D

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Coder, and Founder at www.padexi.academy
visible_instructors.title: Pradeep Mamgain
visible_instructors.name: Pradeep

items.headline: Speed up your CINEMA 4D workflow by using the XPresso module of CINEMA 4D and create your own CINEMA 4D Plugins
objectives_summary: Understand the node based approach of XPresso Editor
Link properties and parameters
Create user defined sliders

items.title: Blender to Unreal Engine 5
items.headline: Complete Guide To Learning How To Create AAA Game Assets In Blender and Then Export to Unreal Engine 5
objectives_summary: •	Following through a complete guide on creating a medieval windmill
•	Using Blender and understanding its interface and shortcuts
•	3D modeling from a beginner level right up to techniques used by professionals around the world in many top games companies

items.title: Animate on iPad: FlipaClip Beginner Course
items.headline: 2D Animation On the Go
objectives_summary: 2D Animation
Start to Finish Animation
Animation on iPad

items.title: Designing for Laser Cutting with Fusion 360
items.headline: Learn how to design and model for Laser Cutting using the free and powerful Fusion 360 3D modeling software!
objectives_summary: Designing for Laser Cutting
Realize your ideas through Laser Cutting
Confidence in Fusion 360 and 3D modeling in general

items.title: Designing Animatable PSD Characters in Procreate
items.headline: Design PSD based characters with proper layer hierarchy to animate in Moho, Character Animator, Animate CC and more!
objectives_summary: Properly layout and design animatable characters that can be imported into Animate CC, Moho, Character Animator and more
